justification: Offer ignores Team B’s beliefs and needs: they’re 0-8, value healthy, stable workhorse RBs, yet A asks for B’s RB2 cornerstone (Sam Lewis) and an injured TE while sending a doubtful RB and TE4. It also conflicts with Team A’s injury-averse style by targeting a doubtful TE. Rationale is generic and A-centric, with no discussion of B’s incentives or constraints. Trade is feasible but ill-aligned with both managers’ profiles.
